settings.title: Viessmann developer account
settings.subtitle: Provide your Client ID
settings.bodytext: Go to https://app.developer.viessmann.com/ and add a new client. Ensure Google reCaptcha is turned off. Set redirect URI to https://callback.athom.com/oauth2/callback
settings.debuginfo: Get the debug information and provide to the developer if you have problem connecting your Viessmann device.
